 1998-12691998-07-150HERITAGE,  ,  ,  ,  , 
PrecisOrder exempting two provincial and one territorial government employees from the application of a number of provisions in the Public Service Employment Act upon their appointment to positions in the Department of Justice as CHIEF FIREARMS OFFICER for Manitoba, the Northwest Territories and Saskatchewan.
